convertZoneXML2Obj

public static Zone convertZoneXML2Obj(java.lang.String zoneID,
                                      ZoneType xmlZone,
                                      Zone objZone)
Converts a XML Zone Type to a Zone Object Type, which is created new with ID All virtual objects (base as well as services) within a Zone are included. ! Conversation loss in types ! Virtual objects IDs are generated on-the-fly

Parameters:
zoneID - String
xmlZone - ZoneType
objZone - Zone
Returns:
Zone
